name: Cold Day in the Sun
wikiSummary: The first song released where Taylor Hawkins sings lead vocals. Sometimes Dave will go on the drums and Taylor will play guitar for this song. According to the Cold Day in the Sun Songfacts, Taylor wrote this song as well.
wikiText: The first song released where Taylor Hawkins sings lead vocals. Sometimes Dave will go on the drums and Taylor will play guitar for this song. According to the Cold Day in the Sun Songfacts, Taylor wrote this song as well.
